Title: Noin 7 veljestä
Writer: Ere Kokkonen, Spede Pasanen, Jukka Virtanen
Actors: Juhani Kumpulainen, Spede Pasanen, Simo Salminen, Danny
Plot: Medieval knight spoof about Sir Wilhelm who wants to court beautiful Helena, the daughter of evil von Wurstburg living in his large castle. People around the village also include Robin Hood...
